descriptor.name: HubSpotCrmApiLib
descriptor.description: Read HubSpot CRM data. Access Contacts, Companies, Deals, Products, and more via the HubSpot API. Ideal for integrating CRM data into your CloverDX workflows.
descriptor.author: CloverDX

subgraphs.description: Returns HubSpot account details along with API rate limits taken from the header

This subgraph provides several basic operations for manipulating HubSpot CRM objects.

Supported operations

List - get all objects
Read - gets data for object by it's ID
Update - updates the HubSpot object 
Archive - moves the object to trash

This graph enables creating,listing or deleting asociations between *instances* of HubSpot CRM objects. It does not alter the schema - you need another method to list. create or delete asocciations on schema level.

This subgraph provides several basic operations for manipulating HubSpot CRM objects.

Supported operations

List - get all objects
Read - gets data for object by it's ID
Update - updates the HubSpot object 
Archive - moves the object to trash

This subgraph provides means to read HubSpot owner objects.

Supported operations

List - get all objects
Read - gets data for object by it's ID
Parse associations from input variant field

This subgraph provides several basic operations for manipulating HubSpot CRM objects.

Supported operations

List - get all objects
Read - gets data for object by it's ID
Update - updates the HubSpot object 
Archive - moves the object to trash

This subgraph returns HubSpot object details along with fully qualified name (fullyQualifiedName field).

 It also returns properties of those Hubsport objects.
